page.title: 08Glaxochem plc. Ulverston
page.content: Glaxochem plc is the largest concern and major employer with{1650 workers on its 265 acre site. It produces pri_ mary compounds,made into pills etc. at the Barnard Castle plant. The Cephalo- sporin type{antibiotics}are "broad- spectrum".It also produces vitamin B12 used in the treatment of anaemia.70% of output is exported. Built in 1948 the fermentation plant is the largest in Europe.After initial caution local residents recognised the {economic benefits}which apart from the creation of employment and the flow of incomes through local firms include: providing better housing and communic- ations and developing new skills. Glaxo is proud of its achievements in its industry and its contribution to Third World development. Parts of the site are at present under a Â£50M development programme.
